TopicTitle: Apollo 1, 11, and 12 LIFE Magazines and newspapers

Articles.Content:
Hi Ksp fans...

I have found some quite interesting magazines from the 60s and 70s about the Apollo missions.

http://imgur.com/a/2FRyL

the "three astronauts" one is about the Apollo 1 disaster

Edited June 30, 2015 by MrWalrus123

Hi Ksp fans...

I have found some quite interesting magazines from the 60s and 70s about the Apollo missions.

http://imgur.com/a/2FRyL

the "three astronauts" one is about the Apollo 1 disaster

Life also did "To the Moon and Back" using the same shot as the Newsweek example in that collection. I have a framed print of the cover on my living room wall.
